Package com.intellij.psi.search

Class LocalSearchScope

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.psi.search.SearchScope
      • com.intellij.psi.search.LocalSearchScope
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditorSelectionLocalSearchScope

    public class LocalSearchScope
extends SearchScope
    Restricts search to given PsiElement(s).
